name: The Variety Box
description:
Solve the puzzles and challenges of the Variety Box to gain access to the content of the vault !

In this small and simple puzzle game, you'll play golf, pinball, mario, and many more ! Good luck !

This small project was a way for me to get working everyday of my vacation. I worked 3 hours each day, and finished the game in about two weeks. I'm pretty proud of myself, even if it's not much.
